statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_rentals;
SELECT equipment_name, rental_date FROM equipment_rentals;
SELECT rental_id, equipment_name, rental_duration FROM equipment_rentals WHERE rental_duration > 3;
SELECT * FROM equipment_rentals ORDER BY rental_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, rental_duration, technical_requirements FROM equipment_rentals WHERE rental_duration < 5 ORDER BY rental_duration ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_rentals ORDER BY rental_date DESC, rental_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT rental_id, equipment_name, rental_duration FROM equipment_rentals WHERE rental_duration > 7 ORDER BY rental_duration DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT equipment_name, technical_requirements FROM equipment_rentals WHERE rental_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY equipment_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM equipment_rentals WHERE rental_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY rental_id ASC
SELECT rental_id, equipment_name, rental_date, rental_duration FROM equipment_rentals WHERE rental_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rental_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Equipment_Rentals;
SELECT equipment_name, rental_date FROM Equipment_Rentals ORDER BY rental_date DESC;
SELECT rental_id, equipment_name, rental_date FROM Equipment_Rentals WHERE rental_duration > 7;
SELECT rental_id, equipment_name FROM Equipment_Rentals WHERE rental_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT equipment_name, SUM(required_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Technical_Requirements GROUP BY equipment_name;
SELECT * FROM Equipment_Rentals WHERE rental_duration > 7;
SELECT equipment_name, rental_date FROM Equipment_Rentals WHERE rental_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rental_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, SUM(required_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Technical_Requirements GROUP BY equipment_name;
SELECT equipment_name, rental_date, rental_duration FROM Equipment_Rentals WHERE rental_duration BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC, rental_date DESC;

SELECT rental_id, equipment_name, technical_details FROM Equipment_Rentals R JOIN Technical_Requirements T ON R.equipment_name = T.equipment_name WHERE R.rental_duration > 7 AND T.required_quantity >= 3 ORDER BY R.rental_id DESC, T.requirement_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM track_equipment_rentals;
SELECT rental_id, equipment_name FROM track_equipment_rentals ORDER BY rental_id ASC;
SELECT rental_id, equipment_name, rental_date FROM track_equipment_rentals WHERE rental_duration > 5;
SELECT equipment_name, rental_date, rental_duration FROM track_equipment_rentals WHERE rental_duration BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY rental_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM technical_requirements WHERE equipment_type = 'sound' AND quantity >= 10;
SELECT rental_id, equipment_name FROM track_equipment_rentals;
SELECT * FROM technical_requirements WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT equipment_name, rental_date FROM track_equipment_rentals WHERE rental_duration > 7;
SELECT venue_name, concert_date, technician_name FROM concert_setup ORDER BY concert_date DESC;
SELECT requirement_name, equipment_type, quantity FROM technical_requirements WHERE equipment_type = 'Audio';
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT equipment_type FROM Equipment;
SELECT * FROM Rentals ORDER BY rental_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, equipment_type FROM Equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM Equipment WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM Rentals INNER JOIN Equipment ON Rentals.equipment_id = Equipment.equipment_id;

SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, TechnicalRequirements.requirement_name FROM Equipment JOIN ConcertSetups ON Equipment.equipment_id = ConcertSetups.equipment_id JOIN TechnicalRequirements ON ConcertSetups.requirement_id = TechnicalRequirements.requirement_id;
SELECT DISTINCT rental_date FROM Rentals ORDER BY rental_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT equipment_name, condition FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Rental WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY rental_date DESC;
SELECT requirement_name, description FROM TechnicalRequirements WHERE equipment_id = 3;
SELECT concert_name, location, date FROM Concert WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE condition = 'Good';
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM Equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Rental WHERE rental_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT setup_name, description FROM Setup WHERE concert_id = 1001;
SELECT concert_name, location FROM Concert WHERE date = '2022-09-15';
